definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The process is known as regenerative braking.
sentences.chinese: 這個過程就是所謂再生制動。

sentences.english: The software system is debugged through the BDM. Finally the controller is tested feasible by simulation experiment.
sentences.chinese: 最後通過模擬實驗驗證了並行再生制動控制器可行性。

sentences.english: Method for recovering electrical energy in a vehicle with regenerative braking.
sentences.chinese: 在具有再生制動的車輛中用於恢復電能的方法。

sentences.english: The design procedures and characteristics of regenerative braking are also introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了再生制動設計步驟及其特性。

sentences.english: The controller controls the regenerated energy when the motor operates in regenerative braking mode.
sentences.chinese: 控制器採取再生制動的方式實現能量回饋。
